name: payload-visual-editor
description: Payload CMS plugin which provides a visual live editor directly in the Admin UI.
author: info@pemedia.de

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/styles.scss dist/styles.scss && yarn tsc
scripts.build-watch: mkdir -p dist && cp src/styles.scss dist/styles.scss && yarn tsc -w
scripts.docker:plugin:build: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'mkdir -p dist && cp src/styles.scss dist/styles.scss && yarn tsc'
scripts.docker:plugin:build-watch: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'mkdir -p dist && cp src/styles.scss dist/styles.scss && yarn tsc -w'
scripts.docker:example:cms:dev: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'cd example/cms && yarn dev'
scripts.docker:example:cms:generate-types: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'cd example/cms && yarn generate:types'
scripts.docker:example:website:dev: docker exec -t payload-visual-editor-node-1 /bin/sh -c 'cd example/website && yarn dev'
